Html:
Guys forgive me for asking because I know this question has been asked many times before. I'm currently using a V1.x of the CSK in C#. I noticed the latest version and revisions are in VB. Is C# no longer supported?

Thanks,
Gio
C# will be available. The development language is in VB (since I am fluent in VB and not C#). I will do a conversion and it should be available at our next beta (2 weeks??).

z2bass wrote:
C# will be available. The development language is in VB (since I am fluent in VB and not C#). I will do a conversion and it should be available at our next beta (2 weeks??).


Great! Thanks and keep up the good work!
How is the progress on converting V3 Beta to C#? I want to help develop CSK but I only know C#.
I know... its still in the plans (I'm taking a Java class so C# won't feel so foreign to me).

How is the C# version going? Have you considered taking advantage of this tool?
http://www.elegancetech.com/CSVB/OpenSource.aspx

They will convert Open Source projects for free.
